name: The Great Heist
description:
Meet our friend in his adventures in the city where he will face a lot of challenges and traps  in his way into the Greatest Heist ever!

---------------------------------------

Controls keyboard: 

  • W/A/S/D -> Movement
  • Space -> Jump
  • E ->  Interact
  • Left-Shift -> Sprint
  • R -> Restart

---------------------------------------

- Game in 72h for SpeedJam #1 Game Jam.

Game made by Alvaro Carbó, Marc Canals and Sergi Bonell.

Music by  @zyegstrieg
